entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
